sentences.en: After the accident, the doctor gave her some pills to sedate her.
sentences.cn: 事故发生后, 医生让她服了些药片使她镇静下来.

sentences.en: He was of a more sedate turn of mind.
sentences.cn: 这个经理是个较为严肃正派的人.

sentences.en: Her London life was sedate, almost mundane.
sentences.cn: 她在伦敦的生活平淡无奇，几乎有些枯燥。

sentences.en: I seemed to be reduced to my former calm, sedate way of living.
sentences.cn: 我似乎又恢复了以前那种安定, 宁静的生活方式.

sentences.en: It took an extremely large dose just to sedate him in the first place.
sentences.cn: 首先需要给他服用大剂量的镇静剂.

sentences.en: It would never do to appear sedate and elderly before Melanie's sweet youthfulness.
sentences.cn: 可千万不能在媚兰那娇嫩的姿色前显得稳重和老气呀!

sentences.en: Miss Arena has a graceful, sedate manner.
sentences.cn: 艾瑞那小姐的仪态优雅文静.

sentences.en: She took them to visit her sedate, elderly cousins.
sentences.cn: 她带他们去拜访她那些不苟言笑的表兄表姐们。

sentences.en: The wedding was rather a sedate occasion.

sentences.cn: 他们想用镇静剂使她静下来.

sentences.en: Upon the most sedate consideration, I resolved that it was absolutely necessary to conceal it all.
sentences.cn: 经过了最冷静的考虑之后, 我认为把他完全隐藏起来是绝对必要的.

sentences.en: Vandeuvres had sat himself down by the stout man, who still looked very sedate.
sentences.cn: 汪德夫尔已经走到那个矮胖子身边坐下,那个人的样子, 依然是很沉着的.

sentences.en: We followed the youngsters at a more sedate pace.
sentences.cn: 我们跟在年轻人后面，步子稍慢一点。

sentences.en: We followed the youngsters at a more sedate pace.
sentences.cn: 我们跟在年轻人后面，步子稍慢一点。

sentences.en: We set off again at a more sedate pace.
sentences.cn: 我们重新上路了，步调更加从容。

words.tran_cn: 镇静；镇静作用；镇静状态
[药] 镇静剂；能使安静的东西；止痛药

trans.tran_cn: 安静的，沉着的，镇静的，静肃的

trans.tran_en: to give someone drugs to make them calm or to make them sleep

trans.tran_cn: 使昏昏入睡，使镇静，给…服镇静剂
